example.name: autogen1
example.text: Last week , Ford encountered a setback in its effort to broaden its U.S. luxury offerings when it was forced to abandon a four-year-old effort to market its German-built Scorpio sedan in the U.S. as a luxury import under the Merkur brand name .
example.arg: in its effort to broaden its U.S. luxury offerings

example.text: setbacks for the junk bond market , where prices began weakening last month after Campeau hit a cash crunch
example.arg: for the junk bond market , where prices began weakening last month after Campeau hit a cash crunch
